TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HtmlInputCheckBox extends System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputControl implements class System.Web.UI.IPostBackDataHandler
Public Class HtmlInputCheckBox Inherits HtmlInputControl Implements IPostBackDataHandler
type HtmlInputCheckBox = class inherit HtmlInputControl interface IPostBackDataHandler

summary.span: 允许对服务器上的 HTML 元素进行编程访问。

span.span: Allows programmatic access to the HTML element on the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 控件允许用户选择 `true` 或 `false` 状态。Use the control to allow the user to select a `true` or `false` state. 若要确定是否选择了控件，请使用 属性。To determine whether the control is selected, use the property. 控件提供了一个 事件，该事件在 属性在向服务器的各次发送过程中的值更改时引发。The control provides a event that is raised when the property changes values between posts to the server. 这允许您创建一个在每次引发事件时执行一组自定义指令的事件处理程序。This allows you to create an event handler that performs a custom set of instructions each time the event is raised. > [!NOTE] > 单击该控件时，控件不会回发到服务器。The control does not post back to the server when it is clicked. 您必须在支持向服务器发布的网页（如控件）上提供另一个控件， 以便将控件的状态发送回服务器。You must provide another control on the Web page that supports posting to the server, such as an control, to send the state of the control back to the server. 有关实例的初始属性值的列表 ，请参见 构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示对用户从一组控件中选择的一组简单的响应 。The following code example demonstrates a set of simple responses to users selecting from a group of controls. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlInputCheckBox Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlInputCheckBox Example/cs/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlInputCheckBox Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlInputCheckBox Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否选择 。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the is selected.

span.span: if the control is selected; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性来确定是否 选择了控件。Use this property to determine whether the control is selected. 此属性还可用于以编程方式设置控件的状态 。This property can also be used to programmatically set the state of the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示对用户从一组控件中选择的一组响应 。The following code example demonstrates a set of responses to users selecting from a group of controls. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlInputCheckBox Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlInputCheckBox Example/cs/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlInputCheckBox Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlInputCheckBox Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 引发 事件并将该控件注册为需要回发处理的控件。

span.span: Raises the event and registers the control as one that requires postback handling.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将重写基 方法。The method overrides the base method. 主要由控件开发人员使用。 is used primarily by control developers. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写 自定义服务器控件中的方法，以便将 `Title` 特性添加到每个 控件中。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control so that a `Title` attribute is added to each control. [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomHtmlInputCheckBoxOnPreRender#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputCheckBoxOnPreRender/CS/custom_htmlinputcheckbox_onprerendercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomHtmlInputCheckBoxOnPreRender#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputCheckBoxOnPreRender/VB/custom_htmlinputcheckbox_onprerendervb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomHtmlInputCheckBoxOnPreRender#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputCheckBoxOnPreRender/CS/custom_htmlinputcheckbox_onprerender.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomHtmlInputCheckBoxOnPreRender#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomHtmlInputCheckBoxOnPreRender/VB/custom_htmlinputcheckbox_onprerender.vb#2)]

span.span: A that contains event information.
Raises the event.

summary.span: 该方法使您可以直接处理该事件。

span.span: This method allows you to handle the event directly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将网页提交给服务器并且 控件更改上一次发布的状态时，将引发此事件。This event is raised when the Web page is submitted to the server and the control changes state from the previous post. 此方法允许你重写基实现并为事件提供自定义处理程序。This method allows you to override the base implementation and provide a custom handler for the event. > [!NOTE] > 控件必须启用视图状态， 事件才能正常工作。The control must have view state enabled for the event to work correctly. 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何为事件指定和编写处理程序 。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlInputCheckBox.ServerChange Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlInputCheckBox.ServerChange Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlInputCheckBox.ServerChange Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlInputCheckBox.ServerChange Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

summary.span: 当将网页提交给服务器并且 控件更改了以前张贴的状态时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the Web page is submitted to the server and the control changes state from the previous post.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将网页提交给服务器并且 控件更改上一次发布的状态时，将引发此事件。This event is raised when the Web page is submitted to the server and the control changes state from the previous post. > [!NOTE] > 控件必须启用视图状态， 事件才能正常工作。The control must have view state enabled for the event to work correctly. 有关如何处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何为事件指定和编写处理程序 。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic HtmlInputCheckBox.ServerChange Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlInputCheckBox.ServerChange Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic HtmlInputCheckBox.ServerChange Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic HtmlInputCheckBox.ServerChange Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]
